title: How many people care about the whole Fire vs Ice thing?
body: Really curious to see what people think about this. I know for me, I voted for diana to get the new skin, but that's the only vote I put in. Ill watch the NA all star team play when they're up, but other than that I don't feel like watching anything else.

replies.body:
I want ice to win because then diana gets an ice themed skin right? Sounds better then a fire themed one.

Not sure if my interest in the event fits into one of your categories but I would say I have moderate interest in the event. The 1v1s are cool because it is different from anything they usually do but a few of the other events are cool too like the all marksmen thing. The strait up 5v5s aren't that great though because the current patch isn't really balanced for it.
